name: Juliet
description:
"Juliet" is Shower Thoughts Development's submission for the GMCJAM17. Play as Juliet, a girl who moves only with her clones, in this unsettling puzzle platformer. Use death to cheat death as you play through 20 original levels and enjoy a combination of original music, art, sound effects, and game design.
